title: Sensky BS029A 110V 360 Degree Microwave Sensor high sensitivity long distance Microwave detector Switch
features: 【Automatic lighting】: With Microwave detector your lights will turn on automatically when you enter a room. The sensor can penetrate glass, lampshade and veneer...
【Stable Working State】: Working temperature( --15℃∼+70℃), wont’t affect it’s sensor function.
【Microwave Radar Sensor】: 360° wide angle detection and up to a distance of 1-8m(radii)

【Easy installation】: Pluggable type of the terminals which make easier and much convenient to install. Detect distance (1-8m radii), ambient light (2-2000LUX) and time-delay(8sec to 12min) adjustable, you can make your own setting.
description: The product is a new saving-energy switch; it adopts microwave sensor mould with high-frequency electro-magnetic wave (5.8GHz), integrated circuit. It gathers automatism, convenience, safety, saving-energy and practicality functions. The wide detection field is consisting of detectors. It works by receiving human motion. When one enters the detection field, it can start the load at once and identify automatically day and night. Its installation is very convenient and its using is very wide. Detection is possible through doors, panes of glass or thin walls.

Model No. : BS029A  Power Sourcing: 110V/AC  Detection Range: 360 degree  Detection Distance: 1-8m (radius) adjustable  Frequency:: 5.8GHz  Ambient Light: 3-2000LUX (Adjustable)  Time-Delay: Min.: about 10sec Max.:12min  Transmission Power :< 10mW  Installing Sit: indoor, ceiling mounting  Power Consumption: approx 0.9W  Detection motion speed:0.6~1.5m/s  Rated Load:600W  Power frequency: 50/60Hz.
The high-frequency output of this sensor is <10Mw- that is just one 100th of the transmission power of a mobile phone or the output of a microwave oven.

title: 12 V 24 V PIR Sensor Adjustable LED Infrared Motion Detector
